name: Resolve: Spirits of the Forest
description:
Play as an adorable ghost and help the Spirits of the Forest by possessing other creatures on this magical island! There are many creatures and abilities to be found around the overworld. It is an open-world style adventure game reminiscent of the Legend of Zelda games. 

Controls

  • WASD - Move around
  • Mouse - Look around
  • Left Click - Attack
  • Right Click - Possess/Siphon
  • Q - Special Ability
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
